# Metrics
This document enumerates the metrics collected by this project.
This project may depend on other projects which also collect metrics.
This means you might have to go searching through the dependency tree to get a full picture of everything collected by this project.

# Pings

 - [usage](#usage)


## usage

This ping is intended to provide a measure of the usage of MozPhab. It's generated after a command is finished.


This ping includes the [client id](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section).

**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1621025/>

The following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| mozphab.environment.distribution_version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Version number of the Operating System or distribution name and version for Linux.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.environment.python_version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Python version  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.environment.vcs.name |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Name of the underlying version control system  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.environment.vcs.version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Version of the underlying version control system  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.submission.commits_number |[counter](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/counter.html) |Amount of commits in the stack.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.submission.preparation |[timespan](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/timespan.html) |Time spent on preparing the commit stack.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.submission.process |[timespan](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/timespan.html) |Time spent on performing the submission.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.usage.command |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Command used to run MozPhab, e.g. `submit` or `patch`.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.usage.duration |[timespan](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/timespan.html) |Time spent on performing an ordered command  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.usage.override_switch |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |True if a --force switch was used to override validation  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.user.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |Unique identifier of each MozPhab user.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
| mozphab.user.installation |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |Unique identifier of each MozPhab installation. A user might install the application on multiple machines/profiles.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1621025#c2)||never |
